short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a Extension you can use to block some site which distract you from being focused.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lockit - Chrome Extension

Say goodbye to distractions and hello to productivity with Lockit! This Chrome extension empowers you to block distracting websites and lock your focus on what truly matters.

Key Features:
Website Blocker: Effortlessly block distracting websites to create a productive browsing environment.
Clean & Lightweight: Designed for speed and simplicity, so you can focus without distractions.
With Lockit, you’re in charge of your digital habits. Take the leap towards better focus and productivity—download Lockit today!
